name: OurHealthMate, Inc.
description: Operator of a health technology company intended to revolutionize healthcare and create positive social change. The company offers preventive health care, employee engagement, employee well-being, and financial wellness, enabling clients to manage organizational well-being.
one_liner: Operator of a health technology company intended to revolutionize healthcare and create positive social change. The company offers preventive health care, employee engagement, employee well-being, and financial wellness, enabling clients to manage organizational well-being.
